segments.text: Yes , I'm going to the cinema , dad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mustn't go to bed very late . Can you be home before nine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I won't be back so early . The film will be over at nine . Can I have the key to the bicycle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I won't let you ride a bicycle late at night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , dad , I'm not a child . I'm 17 already . I'll come back as soon as the film is over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Here's the key . Take care .
segments.speaker: S1
